title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Famine confirmed in Gaza City is 'failure of humanity', UN chief says
items.description: A UN-backed body confirms famine in Gaza Strip and surrounding areas, and says half a million are facing "catastrophic" conditions.

items.title: Russia trying to stop meeting on peace and prolong war, says Zelensky
items.description: Volodymyr Zelensky urges Western allies to impose fresh sanctions on Moscow if it shows no interest in peace.

items.title: Multiple people dead after tour bus rolls over in New York, police say
items.description: A tour bus with more than 50 passengers lost control and rolled over on the New York State Thruway near Pembroke, officials said.

items.title: Canada to remove retaliatory tariffs on many U.S. goods
items.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney said Canada is dropping 25% tariffs on a long list of U.S. products to ease trade tensions.
